text: Ecclesfield United F.C. was an English association football club based in Ecclesfield, South Yorkshire. ==History== Little is known of the club other than that it competed in the FA Cup in the 1927–28 season. ===League and cup history=== {| class="wikitable collapsible " style=font-size:75% |- !colspan="4"|Ecclesfield United League and Cup historyhttp://wildstat.com/p/1/club/ENG_Ecclesfield_FChttp://www.britishnewspaperarchive.co.uk/ |- ! Season !! Division !! Position !! FA Cup |- | 1926–27 || Sheffield Association League || /14 || - |- | 1927–28 || Sheffield Association League || /14 || 1st Qualifying Round |- | 1928–29 || Sheffield Association League || /15 || - |} ==Records== *Best FA Cup performance: 1st Qualifying Round, 1927–28 ==References== Category:Defunct football clubs in England Category:Defunct football clubs in South Yorkshire Category:Sheffield Association League Category:Sheffield Amateur League
title: Ecclesfield United F.C.
